vlive.korean: 제 얼굴 감상한 거라고요? They were observing my face? 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
누가 나오셨을 거라고 생각이 드나요? Can you guess who it is? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.5 부승관의 전생연분 #1 (SeungKwan Boo's Past Life Destiny #1)
vlive.english: Can you guess who it is?

vlive.korean: 비싸서 눈에만 바르는 거라고요? You only put it on your eyes because it's expensive? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 다시 럽하👋
vlive.english: You only put it on your eyes because it's expensive?

vlive.korean: 진짜 이걸 말한다고? - 이걸 말할 거라고? Are you really going to do this? - You're saying that now? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
vlive.english: Are you really going to do this? - You're saying that now?

vlive.korean: 그렇대 이건 편지봉투에 바로 하는 거라고 하네요 - 아 진짜? You're supposed to do it right away on the envelope. - Oh, really? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: You're supposed to do it right away on the envelope. - Oh, really?

examples.korean: She astonished us by saying she was leaving. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 떠날 거라고 말해서 우리를 깜짝 놀라게 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She astonished us by saying she was leaving. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The company can’t expect me to move my home and family at the drop of a hat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 즉각 내 집과 가족을 옮겨갈 거라고 회사가 바랄 수는 없어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The company can’t expect me to move my home and family at the drop of a hat. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don’t think I’ll be any good at tennis, but I’ll give it a try. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 테니스를 조금도 잘할 거라고는 생각하지 않지만 한번 시도는 해 보겠어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t think I’ll be any good at tennis, but I’ll give it a try. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There were no theatres, no cinemas, no coffee bars. It was dead as anything. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 극장도 없고 영화관도 없고 커피점도 없었어. 재미있는 거라고는 전혀 없었지. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There were no theatres, no cinemas, no coffee bars. It was dead as anything. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She thought she would not be able to bear the load of bringing up her family alone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 혼자서 가족을 부양하는 부담을 견딜 수가 없을 거라고 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She thought she would not be able to bear the load of bringing up her family alone. Add to Wordbook
